channel.title: Nulls
channel.description: isn't there a way to remove nulls they always come on to my server i know by restarting :mad: but i want them gone for good -.-.

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

huum…you think a anti-null is going to stop a REAL nuller…its not…it will stop some shitty downloadable nuller client…but not a coded yourself for 8 weeks nuller…trust me i have a very advanced anti-null it will stop the half-witted nullers but the REAL thing…not so mutch i think you should get some facts straight and this also protects you from REAL syi attacks notice im useing the word REAL alot its becase thare are alot of FAILED syi’s witch some FAILED syi-blockers will handle… and thare are some FAILED anti-nullers with will stop some FAILED nullers…

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Just add an anti-null, you don’t need to download any of that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Ok download peergaurd someware (i recommenced v2 someware)
anyways
make a new list call it nuller/syi’s in the list manager
open the list
look on your runserver the same ip should pop up alot copy that ip
go to http://www.hcidata.info/host2ip.cgi
and put the ip in the hostname to ip slot becase in servers it logs on by hostname not ip so once you have the REAL ip insted of fake ip’s go into peergaurd
for range put nuller (range is basicly the name)
then for starting ip put in the ip you got from that website
and for ending ip do the same as starting ip (they will always be teh same)
save
then close the listmanager
then it will say creating list cache
that eans you have done it right
once its done crating the list cache
restart your server =)

BTW!!! be shure to block 71.244.165.201 HE MASS NULLS SOMETIMES
he has been trying to null me for about 3 weeks now so my peergardian is constantly blocking him…i wonder when hell give up…it dosint even lagg my server or my comp…

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Theres always going to be that one annoying person on your server that wants to try to ruin you for not giving them admin or some stupid reaon… so try this.

(ziplock posted this on my topic)
download peergaurd go to http://www.hcidata.info/host2ip.cgi and turn the hostname into a ip…
make a new list call it nuller/syi and add this ip into it =) add the same ip for start and end…

If you dont get this contact ziplock. Im too tired to help alot tonight.

Read full topic
